message: Stalin was right wing. Authoritarianism, fascism, totalitarianism all fall under the right wing. Communism: The absence of the state, economy and social hierarchy in an attempt to create a free and equal society. Stalin believed in the opposite of communism; in fact he decisively used it to skew political beliefs and smokescreen what he was doing. He built one of the most powerful forces of human history with a despotic regime that dominated the Balkans, and even Germany in WW2.
